tool_description: A simple service to generate random credit/debit card numbers.

api_list.name: Generate
api_list.description: Generates random payment card numbers based on specified parameters.

optional_parameters.name: quantity
optional_parameters.description: The number of card numbers to generate.

optional_parameters.name: scheme
optional_parameters.description: The type of card to generate (e.g., VISA, MasterCard).
